description: Rivet is a database migration/change management/versioning tool inspired by Ruby on Rails' Migrations. It creates and applies migration scripts for SQL Server databases. Migration scripts describe changes to make to your database, e.g. add a table, add a column, remove an index, etc. Migrations scripts should get added to your version control system so they can be packaged and deployed with your application's code.
summary: Rivet is an evolutionary database tool for writing and applying SQL Server database migration scripts.
author: Aaron Jensen
